Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
banking.AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
The AccountDatabase class holds the information regarding all the bank accounts. A new account is always added to the end of the array. An instance of this class is a growable list with an initial array capacity of 4, and it automatically increases the capacity by 4 whenever it is full. The list does not decrease in capacity.

  • Constructor Details

    • AccountDatabase

      public AccountDatabase()
      Creates an AccountDatabase object. An AccountDatabase object will hold an array implementation of the Account objects, the size of the database itself, and a linked list representation of closed accounts.

  • Method Details

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Resizes the original database by increasing the size of the array that holds the Account objects by 4. Creates a temporary array with the new length and replaces the old array.

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase and returns index of location in database.
      Parameters:
      account - that is being searched for
      Returns:
      index of the account in the account database when found, -1 otherwise

    • deposit

      public void deposit(AccountNumber number, double amount)
      Deposits money into an Account which will increase the Account's balance. Searches through the AccountDatabase for the Account before depositing the amount of money into that Account. Does nothing if Account is not found using the number.
      Parameters:
      number - AccountNumber that identifies the account
      amount - value of money that will be deposited

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(AccountNumber number, double amount)
      Checks if money can be withdrawn from an account. If the AccountType is Money Market and the balance falls below 2000, changes the AccountType to a savings account.
      Parameters:
      number - AccountNumber that identifies the Account
      amount - value of money that will be withdrawn
      Returns:
      true if the amount can be withdrawn false otherwise

    • hasSufficientFunds

      public boolean hasSufficientFunds(int index, double amount)
      Checks if the Account has at least a certain amount of money.
      Parameters:
      index - of AccountDatabase that represents an Account being checked
      amount - value of money will be checked
      Returns:
      true if the amount of money in the account is greater than or equal to how much the user is checking for false otherwise

    • willDowngrade

      public boolean willDowngrade(int index, double amount)
      Checks if the account will downgrade from a Money Market to a savings account after a withdrawal. If the balance of a Money Market account falls below 2000, it will be downgraded.
      Parameters:
      index - of AccountDatabase that represents an Account being checked
      amount - value of money that will be withdrawn
      Returns:
      true if the amount can be withdrawn false otherwise

    • add

      public void add(Account account)
      Adds an Account to the AccountDatabase. Checks for duplicate accounts and returns if there is one found. Checks size and resizes as needed to make space for the new Account.
      Parameters:
      account - being added to AccountDatabase

    • remove

      public void remove(Account account)
      Removes an Account from the AccountDatabase. Checks if the account to be removed is in the AccountDatabase and returns if it is not. Adds removed Account to the archive before deleting the Account. Replaces Account being deleted with the last Account. Updates the size of the AccountDatabase.
      Parameters:
      account - that is being added to AccountDatabase

    • remove

      public void remove(String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth)
      Removes an Account to the AccountDatabase. Checks if the account to be removed is in the AccountDatabase by checking first name, last name, and date of birth. Calls the remove method that: * Adds removed Account to the archive before deleting the Account * Replaces Account being deleted with the last Account * Updates the size of the AccountDatabase
      Parameters:
      firstName - of the Account
      lastName - of the Account
      dateOfBirth - of the Account

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks the AccountDatabase to determine if it is empty.
      Returns:
      true if the AccountDatabase has no Accounts false otherwise

    • find

      public int find(AccountNumber accountNumber)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase and returns index of location in database. Searches for an Account in the AccountDatabase using AccountNumber.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - that is being searched for
      Returns:
      index of the Account in the AccountDatabase when found, -1 otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Account account)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase. Searches through the AccountDatabase for an Account.
      Parameters:
      account - that is being searched for
      Returns:
      true if Account is found in AccountDatabase false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(AccountNumber accountNumber)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase. Searches through the AccountDatabase for an Account using accountNumber.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - that is being searched for
      Returns:
      true if Account is found in AccountDatabase false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth, AccountType type)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase. Searches through the AccountDatabase for an Account based on first name, last name, dateOfBirth, and account type.
      Parameters:
      firstName - String that is being searched for, comparison is case-insensitive
      lastName - String that is being searched for, comparison is case-insensitive
      dateOfBirth - object that is being searched for
      type - AccountType object that is being searched for
      Returns:
      true if Account is found in AccountDatabase false otherwise

    • contains

      public boolean contains(String firstName, String lastName, Date dateOfBirth)
      Checks if Account is contained in the AccountDatabase. Searches through the AccountDatabase for an Account based on first name, last name, and dateOfBirth.
      Parameters:
      firstName - String that is being searched for
      lastName - String that is being searched for
      dateOfBirth - object that is being searched for
      Returns:
      true if Account is found in AccountDatabase false otherwise

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints all the Accounts in the AccountDatabase from the beginning of AccountDatabase to the end.

    • printByBranch

      public void printByBranch()
      Orders and prints AccountDatabase by the 2-digit String, Branch. Bubble Sort implementation is used to iterate through the array and swap adjacent elements if they are out of order. To print, iterate through AccountDatabase and print County followed by City.

    • printByHolder

      public void printByHolder()
      Orders and prints AccountDatabase by the name and date of birth of the account. Bubble Sort implementation is used to iterate through the array and swap adjacent elements if they are out of order. Calls the print() method.

    • printByType

      public void printByType()
      Orders and prints AccountDatabase by the AccountType. Bubble Sort implementation is used to iterate through the array and swap adjacent elements if they are out of order. The compareTo method referenced below compares by AccountNumber. Prints sorted by AccountType.

    • printArchive

      public void printArchive()
      Prints all the Accounts that have been closed and are in the Archive
